Package com.terremark.exception

Package that contains all the exceptions thrown by the API calls.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
AccessDeniedException Exception thrown when Terremark end point returns HTTP 403 error code.
AuthenticationDeniedException Exception thrown when Terremark end point returns HTTP 401 error code.
InternalServerException Exception thrown when Terremark end point returns HTTP 500 error code.
InvalidRequestException Exception thrown when Terremark end point returns HTTP 400, 412, 415 error codes.
NotFoundException Exception thrown when Terremark end point returns HTTP 404 error code.
NotImplementedException Exception thrown when a method is not implemented in the configured API version.
RequestFailedException Exception thrown when Terremark end point returns HTTP 409, 420, 421 error codes.
ServiceUnavailableException Exception thrown when Terremark end point returns HTTP 503 error code.
TerremarkException Base class for all Terremark exceptions.
 

Package com.terremark.exception Description

Package that contains all the exceptions thrown by the API calls. TerremarkException is the base exception class that is extended by all other exceptions. If the Terremark end point returns an error message, the callers can retrieve the relevant error information by calling TerremarkException.getMajorErrorCode(), TerremarkException.getMinorErrorCode(), TerremarkException.getErrorMessage() methods.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Seshu Pasam
See Also:
com.terremark, com.terremark.api, com.terremark.config
